p: The microstructure analysis was performed according to the method of Zhang et al. [ 53] using environmental scanning electron microscopy (SEM) (Quanta 200 F, FEI, Deutschland GmbH, Kassel, Germany). Briefly, protein samples were taken after lyophilization and sprayed with gold, then the samples were viewed at 5 kV and 3.0 spot sizes in the low vacuum mode to obtain the micro-morphology.
